keyTakeAways: The remains of Kada Scott, a 23-year-old woman reported missing for about two weeks, were found behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia.
An anonymous tip led investigators back to the site, where they discovered a shallow grave containing her remains, confirmed by DNA testing.
Keon King, 21, of Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, causing or risking a catastrophe, conspiracy, and possible homicide.
King’s cellphone had location data tied to Scott’s disappearance, and a stolen black Hyundai Accent was seen at a recreation center on the night of her disappearance.
The car was later found on fire and compacted at a junkyard, limiting forensic examination.
Prosecutors believe others may have been involved in the case, and further investigation is ongoing.
King was previously arrested in a separate kidnapping case, but charges were dropped due to lack of court appearances.
Kada Scott was described by her parents as a source of 'light, kindness and beautiful spirit,' and they expressed deep emotional pain over her disappearance.
District Attorney Larry Krasner stated that homicide charges are likely but that they must follow the law and constitutional procedures.

summaryOfNewsArticle: The remains of 23-year-old Kada Scott, who went missing after leaving an overnight shift at an assisted living facility in Philadelphia, were found behind an abandoned school. Authorities discovered the remains in a shallow grave after an anonymous tip led them to re-examine the area. DNA testing confirmed her identity. Keon King, a 21-year-old man from Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, conspiracy, and possibly homicide. Evidence including cellphone location data and a stolen black Hyundai Accent linked to the time of her disappearance and its subsequent fire adds to the case. Prosecutors say further investigation may reveal additional individuals involved, and while King was previously charged in a separate case (which was dropped), this new case involves serious criminal activity. The case has drawn public attention due to the emotional impact on Scott’s family and the severity of the alleged crimes.
title: Remains found behind abandoned school belong to missing Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, officials say
